fields.name: experiment
fields.title: the iloop experiment identifier (new experiment created if not existing)

fields.name: phase_start
fields.title: hours after 0 that the phase started

fields.name: phase_end
fields.title: hours after 0 that the phase ended

fields.name: sample_name
fields.title: the desired sample name (must be unique within this experiment and project)

fields.name: date
fields.title: starting date for the experiment in YYYY-MM-DD format e.g. 2017-12-24 or 2017/12/24

fields.name: operation
fields.title: arbitrary label with the main factor of interest

fields.name: medium
fields.title: the existing iloop name for the used medium

fields.name: strain
fields.title: the iloop existing strain alias for the strain in this reactor

fields.name: protein_id
fields.title: the protein identifier (currently only uniprot supported)
